talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I came all this way to meet the dazzling
Gerudo who lived here. I can't believe
they've all been killed...
I do sometimes hear voices coming up
<clr:0000>from the wells<clr:ffff>. No doubt about it—the
spirits of stunning Gerudo linger here...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Those poor, magnificent women...
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I came all this way to meet the dazzling
Gerudo who lived here. I can't believe
they've all been killed...
I do sometimes hear voices coming up
<clr:0000>from the wells<clr:ffff>.

Oh, and I also occasionally see <clr:0000>small
shadows moving to the west<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It must be the spirits of the stunning
Gerudo, lingering here still. <sp:5:0:0>Those poor,
magnificent women...
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Phew. You're just another real, living
person... I was certain one of the ghosts
haunting this place had come for me!
I traveled out here hoping to meet the
wonderful, amazing Gerudo women who
lived here, but there's...no one...
I do sometimes hear voices coming up
<clr:0000>from the wells<clr:ffff>. Oh, and I also occasionally
see <clr:0000>small shadows moving to the west<clr:ffff>...
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Obviously the place is now haunted by the
restless spirits of the beautiful Gerudo
who were slain by the strange monsters!
If I'm not careful, the same monsters
might get me too...
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I came all this way to meet the dazzling
Gerudo who lived here. I can't believe
they've all been killed...
I do sometimes hear voices coming up
<clr:0000>from the wells<clr:ffff>. Oh, and I also occasionally
see <clr:0000>small shadows moving to the west<clr:ffff>...
No doubt about it—those are all signs that
the spirits of the stunning Gerudo linger
here still...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Those poor, magnificent women...
talk0008:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900>Shh! Shh! Not so loud!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:0:2:2:5000>I can hear voices. They're coming from below...


Something about a <clr:0000>secret<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0> Could this be the reason
the ghosts haven't moved on? Is it a secret about
the monsters that doubtlessly killed them?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0009:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0901>Shh! Shh! Not so loud!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0700><sp:0:2:2:5000>If you're too loud, the guards might find us! Plus, it
makes it hard to hear the voices coming from below.

Something about a <clr:0000>secret<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>


I was hearing these voices even during the
sand shroud. Could they be the calls of those
brave Gerudo who fell to the monsters?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>The ghosts of those marvelous Gerudo have a
<clr:0000>secret<clr:0200>...<sp:5:0:0> I wonder what's happening down there...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Phew. You're just another real, living
person... I was certain one of the ghosts
haunting this place had come for me!
I traveled out here hoping to meet the
wonderful, amazing Gerudo women who
lived here, but there's...no one...
I do sometimes hear voices coming up
<clr:0000>from the wells<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Obviously the place is now haunted by the
restless spirits of the beautiful Gerudo
who were slain by the strange monsters!
If I'm not careful, the same monsters
might get me too...
